title: Montana Bargain
description: A clean historical western cowboy romance novel about a mail order bride.  Echo Canyon Brides: Book 2  Dr. Erin Avery and Dr. Winslow Wu, strike a bargain: Echo, Montana needs a doctor, Erin wants her own practice, and he wants a wife. They find love together, but a lurking darkness threatens to kill their dreams of happiness.
author: Linda Bridey
